column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We got the bao (ok
column2: but you can skip it and get better elseswhere in Houston)
column3: and takoyaki (not crazy about these). What saved the meal was the ramen
column4: of course. I had the Tonkotsu black
column5: everything in that bowl was gone
column6: very flavorful. Next time I will skip the apps and dive into ramen. Very cozy spot too
column7: we went late on Saturday night and were immediately greeted and seated. Would recommend.
